title: What are some rock songs with 2 guitars, bass, piano and a singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sweet Home Alabama springs to mind straight off, along with Freebird. Google bands with this line up and you’ll have a host of songs to choose from. Off the top of my head look at the following bands/artists: SqueezeThe StranglersSpringsteenBowieDeep Purple (organ not piano)Alman BrothersThe BeatlesThe StonesXTCSome Oasis (Don’t Look Back in Anger)Paul Weller 90s to present day

There are thousands of rock songs with 2 guitars, bass, piano and a singer. (You said “bass” twice but I don’t think you meant it that way.) You should just listen to more rock music find songs that appeal to you. It sounds like you are asking for lists, but those could go on forever and I don’t think you would learn much from them. Immerse yourself in music!
